Title: Relates to a tax deduction for small business employers for certain wages and compensation paid to employees earning minimum wage
Summary: Provides a tax deduction for small business employers of 25% of the wages, salary or compensation paid to up to ten employees who earn up to 110% of the minimum wage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to a deduction for small business employers for certain wages and compensation paid to employees
